ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:34}); //
[Turtle's Paradise] is now having a
publicity campaign.{PAUSE}Flyer's will be posted all over the world.
So make sure you look for our
flyers that say "Turtle's Paradise"{PAUSE}There's six in all.
If you find them all,
make sure to let the owner of Turtle's
Paradise know. You can win a prize!{PAUSE}All you have to do is read them.
Please don't take them down
or rip them up!!
Owner, Turtle's Paradise

dialogStrings: Wutai

{Yuffie}
Hey!!

Life is just like a river.
It flows from the large ocean of life,
and eventually it returns back to it.{PAUSE}Wutai is a historical place.
There are some very unusual things
here you should see.

{Yuffie}?
I saw her a while ago.
She must be in one of
the houses around here.

Materia is like Life.
They both come from the large ocean of life,
and both must return to it.

Life is like the dew on the leaves of the trees.
Whether Meteor falls or not is
no more than a fleeting glimmer.

Lord Godo is in this house.{PAUSE}He used to be quite strong,
but now, all he does is sleep

What, {Yuffie}
It's best to ask Lord Godo about that.{PAUSE}But today he's not in the best of
Well, I should say
But really he's not so

Anyhow, for some reason
{Yuffie}'s had a fondness
for Materia ever since
I can remember.{PAUSE}She's always hung around
places she thought
might have it.

That's just how she is.
Sometimes she'll just
bust into people's houses.{PAUSE}Other times she'll hide in the shadows
just like a little kid.

That reminds me, lately I've seen a
kid around here that reminds
me of {Yuffie}.{PAUSE}Always sneakin' around corners and
doin' somethin' she shouldn't.

She's always getting into fights.
I guess she takes
after Godo that way.{PAUSE}Like father like daughter

Two girls just went off towards
Da-chao. I wonder if
that place is popular
with the kids now?{PAUSE}One had herself all tangled up in
a rope. And the other one kind of
looked like {Yuffie}.

Hm, money?
There's all kinds of money.{PAUSE}This type and that
Hey now that you mention it,
there was some money over there.

The end is right in front of us{PAUSE}But what can you do about it?
Just go on living your
life, day in and day out

Alright, alright, alright!
I know!{PAUSE}On the side of the mountain, right there
in your face is Da-chao!{PAUSE}I hear you can climb to the top,
but since it's dangerous
I'd be mighty careful if I were you!

A girl with Materia?
No, there hasn't been anyone climbing
Da-chao for some time now.

You know I've noticed that there's a
pounding noise from time to time
in this store.

Why Da-chao?
Alright, alright, alright!
I don't know!

Alright, alright, alright!
I saw an old man in flashy clothes running
towards Da-chao!{PAUSE}He was babblin' somethin' and looked
like he was floatin'!
He almost bowled me over!

When that big star bashes into us,
both Wutai and Da-chao are going to
be dust! Can't we do anything?

[Save Point]
Access the menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
This is MY house! Nobody gets in!

{Cloud}
You can't get away, {Yuffie}.

{Tifa}
Give it up, {Yuffie}!

{Cid}
You lost, {Yuffie}.

{Yuffie}
OOK, I know
I was wrong{PAUSE}You win.
I'll give you back your Materia

{Aeris}
I don't think she came out from here
Is that OK?

{Barret}
Wait, that damn {Yuffie}'s
gotta be somewhere in this
cheap town! You jus' gonna leave?

{Tifa}
Knowing {Yuffie},
she's still hidden somewhere in town.
You sure?

{Red XIII}
I know she hasn't left town!
You still want to leave?

{Cid}
You lettin' that damn kid off the hook?
I know she's gotta be
hiding around here somewhere!

{Vincent}
She couldn't have left town
I think she is must still be here.
Or, do you want to go on?

Pub [Turtle's Paradise]
Publicity Flyers!
Notice

[Turtle's Paradise] is now having a
publicity campaign.{PAUSE}Flyer's will be posted all over the world.
So make sure you look for our
flyers that say "Turtle's Paradise"{PAUSE}There's six in all.
If you find them all,
make sure to let the owner of Turtle's
Paradise know. You can win a prize!{PAUSE}All you have to do is read them.
Please don't take them down
or rip them up!!
Owner, Turtle's Paradise
